module.name: CID Superfecta
module.description: Provides simultaneous use of, and complete control over multiple caller id data sources.
module.changelog: *2.11.4* Sources updates and error clean up *2.11.3* Added paginasblancas.ar and sugarcm *2.11.2* Added in PDO Database search, Regular Expressions Search, FOP2 Phonebook search, Abandon Lookup, Trunk Provided Updates, also fixed descriptions in source items *2.11.1* Added in a bunch of sources: Send To Growl, Send To URL, OpenCNAM, TAB Reloaded, CallWithUs, Send to MythTV and Asteridex *2.11.0beta4* Remove dangling symlinks. Remove all illegal sources (against TOS) *2.11.0beta2* Fix sources versioning *2.11.0beta1.2* fix xml *2.11.0beta1.1* import into online repo
